quiz.question: What is the element of a mistunderstanding defense? (ref 2)
answerOptions: A material term that has one or more reasonable interpretations
Eash side attaches different meaning to the term
Both parties knows of the confusion
A material term that has three or more reasonable interpretations

quiz.question: What are the defenses to contract formation? 1) Understanding of a material term, 2) Incapacity, 3) Mistake, 4) Fraud / Misrepresentation/Nondisclosure, 5) Duress, 6) Legality, 7) Unconsciounability. (ref 2)
